name: Buy product flow
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: new_updated_record
code.description: New or updated subscriptions in Zuora

extended_output_schema.name: AccountId
extended_output_schema.label: Account ID
extended_output_schema.hint: The ID of a valid account ID.

extended_output_schema.name: AutoRenew
extended_output_schema.label: Auto Renew
extended_output_schema.hint: Subscription automatically renews at the end of the term.

extended_output_schema.name: CancelledDate
extended_output_schema.label: Cancelled Date
extended_output_schema.hint: The date of the Amendment object.

extended_output_schema.name: ContractAcceptanceDate
extended_output_schema.label: Contract Acceptance Date
extended_output_schema.hint: The date the customer accepts the contract.

extended_output_schema.name: ContractEffectiveDate
extended_output_schema.label: Contract Effective Date
extended_output_schema.hint: The date the contract takes effect.

extended_output_schema.name: CpqBundleJsonId__QT
extended_output_schema.label: Cpq Bundle Json ID
extended_output_schema.hint: The Bundle product structures from Zuora Quotes if you utilize Bundling in Salesforce.

extended_output_schema.name: CurrentTermPeriodType
extended_output_schema.label: Current Term Period Type
extended_output_schema.hint: The period type for the current subscription term.

extended_output_schema.name: Id
extended_output_schema.label: ID
extended_output_schema.hint: Enter the ID of the subscription you want to update.

extended_output_schema.name: InitialTerm
extended_output_schema.label: Initial Term
extended_output_schema.hint: The length of the period for the first subscription term.

extended_output_schema.name: InitialTermPeriodType
extended_output_schema.label: Initial Term Period Type
extended_output_schema.hint: The period type for the first subscription term.

extended_output_schema.name: InvoiceOwnerId
extended_output_schema.label: Invoice Owner ID
extended_output_schema.hint: A valid account ID.

extended_output_schema.name: IsInvoiceSeparate
extended_output_schema.label: Invoice Separate
extended_output_schema.hint: Subscription is invoiced separately.

extended_output_schema.name: Name
extended_output_schema.label: Name
extended_output_schema.hint: The unique identifier of the subscription.

extended_output_schema.name: Notes
extended_output_schema.label: Notes
extended_output_schema.hint: Use this field to record comments about the subscription.

extended_output_schema.name: OpportunityCloseDate__QT
extended_output_schema.label: Opportunity Close Date
extended_output_schema.hint: The closing date of the Opportunity.

extended_output_schema.name: OpportunityName__QT
extended_output_schema.label: Opportunity Name
extended_output_schema.hint: The unique identifier of the Opportunity.

extended_output_schema.name: QuoteBusinessType__QT
extended_output_schema.label: Quote Business Type
extended_output_schema.hint: The specific identifier for the type of business transaction the Quote represents such as New, Upsell, Downsell, Renewal or Churn.

extended_output_schema.name: QuoteNumber__QT
extended_output_schema.label: Quote Number
extended_output_schema.hint: The unique identifier of the Quote.

extended_output_schema.name: QuoteType__QT
extended_output_schema.label: Quote Type
extended_output_schema.hint: The Quote type that represents the subscription lifecycle stage such as New, Amendment, Renew or Cancel.

extended_output_schema.name: RenewalSetting
extended_output_schema.label: Renewal Setting
extended_output_schema.hint: Specifies whether a termed subscription will remain termed or change to evergreen it is renewed.

extended_output_schema.name: RenewalTerm
extended_output_schema.label: Renewal Term
extended_output_schema.hint: The length of the period for the subscription renewal term.

extended_output_schema.name: RenewalTermPeriodType
extended_output_schema.label: Renewal Term Period Type
extended_output_schema.hint: The period type for the subscription renewal term.

extended_output_schema.name: ServiceActivationDate
extended_output_schema.label: Service Activation Date
extended_output_schema.hint: The date the subscription is activated.

extended_output_schema.name: Status
extended_output_schema.label: Status
extended_output_schema.hint: Allowed values are: Pending Activation, Draft, Pending Acceptance, Active, Cancelled, Expired or Suspended.

extended_output_schema.name: TermStartDate
extended_output_schema.label: Term Start Date
extended_output_schema.hint: The date the subscription term begins.

extended_output_schema.name: TermType
extended_output_schema.label: Term Type
extended_output_schema.hint: Indicates if a subscription is termed or evergreen.

extended_output_schema.name: Version
extended_output_schema.label: Version
extended_output_schema.hint: The version number of the subscription.

properties.label: AllowFeatureChanges
properties.hint: Controls whether to allow your users to add or remove features while creating or amending a subscription.
properties.name: AllowFeatureChanges

properties.label: Category
properties.hint: Allowed values are: Base Products, Add On Services or Miscellaneous Products.
properties.name: Category

properties.label: Effective Start Date
properties.hint: The date the product becomes available.
properties.name: EffectiveStartDate

properties.label: ID
properties.hint: Enter the ID of the product you want to update.
properties.name: Id

properties.label: SKU
properties.hint: The unique SKU for the product.
properties.name: SKU
